DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To evaluate overall response rate , overall survival , progression-free survival duration response . II . To describe toxicity associate BKM120 lymphoma . III . To evaluate prognostic factor aggressive lymphoma whether 's correlation clinical benefit . TERTIARY OBJECTIVES : I . To assess serum cytokine BKM120 therapy . II . To assess phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase ( PI3K ) pathway member expression paraffin-embedded tumor sample pre-treatment . III . To assess paired fresh tumor tissue obtain consent patient pre- post-therapy change activation PI3K pathway member . OUTLINE : Patients receive buparlisib orally ( PO ) daily ( QD ) day 1-28 .
